item.description:
What Better way to celebrate Cinco De mayo then with The Bernadette's at El Torero restaurant.


For over three decades we've been preparing authentic Mexican meals in our kitchen. Being consistent, using all natural and fresh ingredients keep us "Still the Best Around". Our Lunch, Dinner and Weekly special Menus offer a large variety to satisfy many tastes Even the Kids! Our popular and unique Margaritas are made with fresh squeezed lime juice and we're told they can't be duplicated! We take pride in our excellent quality of food, beverages and service in our relaxed, festive Mexican atmosphere.

The Bernadette's will be playing from 8-12. Anyone who wants to go for dinner be there early. I will be there around 6pm. You can contact me via my email maraucci@yahoo.com or just note it in your response. Hope to see you there!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Margaret from Party Express

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Come celebrate Cinco De Mayo with the Bernadette's at El Torero
